department: Dpt of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase of 15 new ATVs for the Canadian High Arctic Research station
description: Request for Proposal for 15 new all terrain vehicles to be delivered to the Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR) end user
tags: Automotive and light truck maintenance and repair
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

* **Tender Title and Reference:** 3Y004-230011(2) - All Terrain Vehicles
	+ Solicitation Number: WS3790553683
	+ Reference Number: WS3790553683-3981592268
* **Tender Information:**
	+ Publication Date: June 14, 2023
	+ Tender Closing Date: August 1, 2023 (2:00 pm EST)
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: August 14, 2023
	+ Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2025
	+ Status: Cancelled
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* **Contract and Delivery Information:**
	+ Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada
	+ End User Entity: Polar Knowledge Canada (POLAR)
	+ Address: 170 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5V5, Canada
* **Tender Description:**
	+ Polar Knowledge Canada requires the supply of 15 new all-terrain vehicles (ATVs) over a three-year period. The ATVs are for the Canadian High Arctic Research Station. The delivery locations and addresses are listed in Annex B. 

### Notes for Bidders:

* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and the CanadaBuys posting closing time.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by August 1, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST.
* All bids submitted after August
